title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
t. Stand back. I'm going first.

Choosing dialog 1 will gain the approval of Lae'zel, and she goes in first. Choosing dialogue 2 will anger Lae'zel and she will demand for you to respect her wishes to go first. You will have the following dialogue options.

Very well. Step forward and be cleansed. You would still be hunting for this place without my guidance. I will cured first. Make way, Lae'zel. I am purging myself on this damned parasite.

Lae'zel Sits in the Device First

Lae'zel sits first.
